annotation.title: NISAR L1 RIFG Product
annotation.reference_document: D-102270 NISAR NASA SDS Product Specification L1 Range Doppler Wrapped Interferogram

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceAbsoluteOrbitNumber
integer.annotation: Absolute orbit number for the reference RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryAbsoluteOrbitNumber
integer.annotation: Absolute orbit number for the secondary RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceIsJointObservation
string.annotation: "True" if any portion of the reference RSLC was acquired in a joint observation mode (e.g., L-band and S-band simultaneously), "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryIsJointObservation
string.annotation: "True" if any portion of the secondary RSLC was acquired in a joint observation mode (e.g., L-band and S-band simultaneously), "False" otherwise

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/trackNumber
integer.annotation: Track number

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/frameNumber
integer.annotation: Frame number

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/missionId
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingCenter
string.annotation: Data processing center

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productType
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/granuleId
string.annotation: Unique granule identification name

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version which represents the structure of the product and the science content governed by the algorithm, input data, and processing parameters

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productSpecificationVersion
string.annotation: Product specification version which represents the schema of this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction, either "Left" or "Right"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/orbitPassDirection
string.annotation: Orbit direction, either "Ascending" or "Descending"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceZeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time (in UTC) of reference RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceZeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time (in UTC) of reference RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryZeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time (in UTC) of secondary RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryZeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time (in UTC) of secondary RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isUrgentObservation
string.annotation: Flag indicating if observation is nominal ("False") or urgent ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/listOfFrequencies
string.annotation: List of frequency layers available in the product

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/diagnosticModeFlag
integer.annotation: Indicates if the radar operation mode is a diagnostic mode (1-2) or DBFed science (0): 0, 1, or 2

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productLevel
string.annotation: Product level. L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isGeocoded
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the product data is in the radar geometry ("False") or in the map geometry ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingPolygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representing the bounding polygon of the image. Horizontal coordinates are WGS84 longitude followed by latitude (both in degrees), and the vertical coordinate is the height above the WGS84 ellipsoid in meters. The first point corresponds to the start-time, near-range radar coordinate, and the perimeter is traversed in counterclockwise order on the map. This means the traversal order in radar coordinates differs for left-looking and right-looking sensors. The polygon includes the four corners of the radar grid, with equal numbers of points distributed evenly in radar coordinates along each edge

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingDateTime
string.annotation: Processing date and time (in UTC) in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/radarBand
string.annotation: Acquired frequency band, either "L" or "S"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/platformName
string.annotation: Name of the platform used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/instrumentName
string.annotation: Name of the instrument used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingType
string.annotation: Nominal (or) Urgent (or) Custom (or) Undefined

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isDithered
string.annotation: "True" if the pulse timing was varied (dithered) during acquisition, "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if this product is generated from reference and secondary RSLCs with different range bandwidths, "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isFullFrame

annotation.frameCoveragePercentage: Percentage of NISAR frame containing processed data
annotation.thresholdPercentage: Threshold percentage used to determine if the product is full frame or partial frame

string.annotation: "True" if the product fully covers a NISAR frame, "False" if partial coverage

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/compositeReleaseId
string.annotation: Unique version identifier of the science data production system

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed image in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of grid. Same as difference between consecutive samples in slantRange array

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for raster layers. This is same as the spacing between consecutive entries in the zeroDopplerTime array

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/sceneCenterAlongTrackSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal along-track spacing in meters between consecutive lines near mid-swath of the product images

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/sceneCenterGroundRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal ground range spacing in meters between consecutive pixels near mid-swath of the product images

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range vector

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time since UTC epoch vector

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/digitalElevationModel

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Digital Elevation Model (DEM) in radar coordinates. This dataset is produced using Copernicus WorldDEM-30 Copyright DLR e.V. 2010-2014 and Copyright Airbus Defence and Space GmbH 2014-2018 provided under COPERNICUS by the European Union and ESA; all rights reserved. This dataset is generated by referencing the Copernicus DEM elevations to the WGS84 ellipsoid and projecting them onto a range/Doppler grid

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/mask
integer.annotation: Mask indicating the subswaths of valid samples in the reference RSLC and geometrically-coregistered secondary RSLC. Each pixel value is a two-digit number: the least significant digit represents the subswath number of that pixel in the secondary RSLC, and the most significant digit represents the subswath number of that pixel in the reference RSLC. A value of ‘0’ in either digit indicates an invalid sample in the corresponding RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/HH/wrappedInterferogram
real.annotation: Interferogram between HH layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/HH/coherenceMagnitude

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Coherence magnitude between HH layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/VV/wrappedInterferogram
real.annotation: Interferogram between VV layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/VV/coherenceMagnitude

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Coherence magnitude between VV layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/sceneCenterAlongTrackSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal along-track spacing in meters between consecutive lines near mid-swath of the product images

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/sceneCenterGroundRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal ground range spacing in meters between consecutive pixels near mid-swath of the product images

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of the offset grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Along-track spacing of the offset grid

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/mask
integer.annotation: Mask indicating the subswaths of valid samples in the reference RSLC and geometrically-coregistered secondary RSLC. Each pixel value is a two-digit number: the least significant digit represents the subswath number of that pixel in the secondary RSLC, and the most significant digit represents the subswath number of that pixel in the reference RSLC. A value of ‘0’ in either digit indicates an invalid sample in the corresponding RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/digitalElevationModel

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Digital Elevation Model (DEM) in radar coordinates. This dataset is produced using Copernicus WorldDEM-30 Copyright DLR e.V. 2010-2014 and Copyright Airbus Defence and Space GmbH 2014-2018 provided under COPERNICUS by the European Union and ESA; all rights reserved. This dataset is generated by referencing the Copernicus DEM elevations to the WGS84 ellipsoid and projecting them onto a range/Doppler grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/HH/slantRangeOffset

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Slant range offset

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/HH/alongTrackOffset

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Along-track offset

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/HH/correlationSurfacePeak
real.annotation: Normalized correlation surface peak

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/VV/slantRangeOffset

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Slant range offset

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/VV/alongTrackOffset

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Along-track offset

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/VV/correlationSurfacePeak
real.annotation: Normalized correlation surface peak

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range vector

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time since UTC epoch vector

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/epsg
integer.annotation: EPSG code corresponding to the coordinate system used for representing the geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/coordinateY
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified EPSG code

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/coordinateX
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified EPSG code

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/incidenceAngle
real.annotation: Incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/losUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/losUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/elevationAngle
real.annotation: Elevation angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/parallelBaseline

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Parallel component of the InSAR baseline

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/perpendicularBaseline

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Perpendicular component of the InSAR baseline

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range values corresponding to the geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler time since UTC epoch values corresponding to the geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/groundTrackVelocity
real.annotation: Absolute value of the platform velocity scaled at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/heightAboveEllipsoid
real.annotation: Height values above WGS84 Ellipsoid corresponding to the location grid

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/runConfigurationContents
string.annotation: Contents of the run configuration file with parameters used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if reference RSLC is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/rfiMitigationApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if RFI mitigation has been applied to reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference Terrain Height as a function of time for reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/slantRangeStart
real.annotation: Slant range start distance for the reference RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/numberOfRangeSamples
integer.annotation: Number of slant range samples for each azimuth line within the reference RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/numberOfAzimuthLines
integer.annotation: Number of azimuth lines within the reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for reference RSLC raster layers

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time (in UTC) of the reference RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if secondary RSLC is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/rfiMitigationApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if RFI mitigation has been applied to secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference Terrain Height as a function of time for secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/slantRangeStart
real.annotation: Slant range start distance for the secondary RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/numberOfRangeSamples
integer.annotation: Number of slant range samples for each azimuth line within the secondary RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/numberOfAzimuthLines
integer.annotation: Number of azimuth lines within the secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for secondary RSLC raster layers

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time (in UTC) of the secondary RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: Common Doppler centroid used for processing interferogram

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/dopplerBandwidth
real.annotation: Common Doppler Bandwidth used for processing interferogram

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/interferogram/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for frequency A interferometric layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/interferogram/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for frequency A interferometric layers

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/interferogram/frequencyA/numberOfRangeLooks
integer.annotation: Number of looks applied in the slant range direction to form the wrapped interferogram

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/interferogram/frequencyA/numberOfAzimuthLooks
integer.annotation: Number of looks applied in the along-track direction to form the wrapped interferogram

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/interferogram/frequencyA/commonBandRangeFilterApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if common band range filter has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/interferogram/frequencyA/commonBandAzimuthFilterApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if common band azimuth filter has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/interferogram/frequencyA/ellipsoidalFlatteningApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the interferometric phase has been flattened with respect to a zero height ellipsoid

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/interferogram/frequencyA/topographicFlatteningApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the interferometric phase has been flattened with respect to topographic height using a DEM

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/isOffsetsBlendingApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if pixel offsets are the results of blending multi-resolution layers of pixel offsets

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/alongTrackWindowSize
integer.annotation: Along-track cross-correlation window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/slantRangeWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/alongTrackSearchWindowSize
integer.annotation: Along-track cross-correlation search window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/slantRangeSearchWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation search window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/alongTrackSkipWindowSize
integer.annotation: Along-track cross-correlation skip window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/slantRangeSkipWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation skip window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/correlationSurfaceOversampling
integer.annotation: Oversampling factor of the cross-correlation surface

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/temporalBaseline
integer.annotation: Time interval between reference and secondary RSLCs

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/reference/interpMethod
string.annotation: Orbit interpolation method, either "Hermite" or "Legendre"

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/reference/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time since UTC epoch corresponding to position and velocity records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/reference/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/reference/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/reference/orbitType
string.annotation: Orbit product type, either "FOE", "NOE", "MOE", "POE", or "Custom", where "FOE" stands for Forecast Orbit Ephemeris, "NOE" is Near real-time Orbit Ephemeris, "MOE" is Medium precision Orbit Ephemeris, and "POE" is Precise Orbit Ephemeris

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/secondary/interpMethod
string.annotation: Orbit interpolation method, either "Hermite" or "Legendre"

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/secondary/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time since UTC epoch corresponding to position and velocity records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/secondary/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/secondary/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/secondary/orbitType
string.annotation: Orbit product type, either "FOE", "NOE", "MOE", "POE", or "Custom", where "FOE" stands for Forecast Orbit Ephemeris, "NOE" is Near real-time Orbit Ephemeris, "MOE" is Medium precision Orbit Ephemeris, and "POE" is Precise Orbit Ephemeris

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/reference/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time since UTC epoch corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/reference/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/reference/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/reference/attitudeType
string.annotation: Attitude type, either "FRP", "NRP", "PRP, or "Custom", where "FRP" stands for Forecast Radar Pointing, "NRP" is Near Real-time Pointing, and "PRP" is Precise Radar Pointing

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/secondary/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time since UTC epoch corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/secondary/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/secondary/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/secondary/attitudeType
string.annotation: Attitude type, either "FRP", "NRP", "PRP, or "Custom", where "FRP" stands for Forecast Radar Pointing, "NRP" is Near Real-time Pointing, and "PRP" is Precise Radar Pointing

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/softwareVersion
string.annotation: Software version used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/coregistrationMethod
string.annotation: RSLC coregistration method

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/geometryCoregistration
string.annotation: Geometry coregistration algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/crossCorrelation
